game.name: Guardians vs Zombies
game.description:
Here is a good news for all the zombie lovers! We have brought to you a brand new action packed game where there is more thrill and fun to explore. The brain munching zombies have just taken over the entire world and are ready to kill you irrespective of who you are. However, you are the one who has the skill to stand against these blood thirsty creatures and save the humanity in the optimum possible way. For this purpose, you have to join Guardians Vs Zombies, which is an exclusively-designed free online zombie game.

People are worrying about destroying this futuristic metropolis with huge army of zombies. Join this HTML5 game to play the role of the brave soldiers! Be attentive and keep improving your abilities to defend the city from these monsters! Don?t forget to collect different kinds of weapons in this turn-based strategy! Upgrade system, 3 abilities, multiple levels and addictive gameplay, this mobile action game has a lot to offer.

Feel free to select from various types of levels and get ready to enjoy the fully action-packed gameplay! Click and slide to build the unit! Killing all the zombies that you can coming towards you to win this exciting and defense game! Before shooting your enemies, make sure to place the guardians at the right position. All the best to show off your intense fighting skills and become a hero of the world?s popular war! Browse through an extensive variety of best action games for free at our website to have fun!Â
